duàn
to break; to snap; to cut off; to give up or abstain from sth; to judge; (usu. used in the negative) absolutely; definitely; decidedly
сломать; щелкнуть; отрезать; отказаться или воздержаться от чего-либо; судить; (обычно используется в отрицательном смысле) абсолютно; определенно; решительно

heisig_chinese_memo: Mountain people who eat cocoons for food have to divide the cocoons, which are sometimes stuck together, by severing them with an axe.

duàn: (глаг) прерывать, бросать, избавляться от

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A man puts some rice on a fishhook as bait, but catches a fish so strong, he needs to take out his axe and sever the line lest he be dragged into the depths.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " 𢇍 " from the " burden ", the original meaning is truncated. "Said Wen": "𣃔, cut also. From the catty from the 𢇍. 𢇍, the ancient prose absolutely. 𠸿, the ancient prose breaks from the 𠧢. 𠧢, the ancient prose word. The "Book of Zhou" says: "𠸿𠸿 no other skills." 𠜷 , Also in ancient Chinese." See " Absolute ". "Poetry‧Binfeng‧July": "Eating melon in July, breaking the pot in August."

" Broken " can mean specifically a broken or broken body of a person. "Book of Rites-Wang Zhi": "The deaf, lame, dwarf, and Baigong each use their utensils to eat." Zheng Xuan's note: "Duan means that the branch is absolutely."

" Severe " also means severance and isolation. "Book of Rites-Confucianism": "No more rumors, no more rumors, constant power, not accustomed to their plots." Kong Yingdashu: "Stop, absolutely.

" Break " can also mean cut or kill. "Han Shu-Huainan Li Wang Liu Chang Biography": "Fortunate officials are guilty, the big one is decisive, the small one is tortured with flesh, and is not benevolent." Yan Shi's ancient note: "It means to cut it."

" Off " also means distinction. "Yi Zhou Shu‧ Du Xun": "The King of Ming judges likes and dislikes by extreme rank, and teaches the people by order."

" Off " can also mean judgment. "Yi‧XiCi": "The line of words can be used to judge good and bad, so it is called Yao."

" Off " may refer decisively. "Historical Records-Li Si Biography": "Dare to do it, and ghosts and gods avoid it."

" Duan " can also be used as an adverb, expressing decisive, certain and other semantics. "Yi‧Xi Ci 2": "Jie is like Shi Yan, and I would rather use it all day long, but I can know it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " 𢇍 " from the " burden ", the original meaning is truncated.
humanum_full_description:
從「𢇍」，從「斤」，本義為截斷。《說文》：「𣃔，截也。从斤从𢇍。𢇍，古文絕。𠸿，古文斷从𠧢。𠧢，古文叀字。《周書》曰：『𠸿𠸿猗無他技。』𠜷，亦古文。」參見「絕」。《詩‧豳風‧七月》：「七月食瓜，八月斷壺。」

　　「斷」可表示特指人的肢體斷折。《禮記‧王制》：「瘖聾跛躄斷者、侏儒，百工各以其器食之。」鄭玄注：「斷，謂支節絕也。」

　　「斷」還表示斷絕、隔絕。《禮記‧儒行》：「過言不再，流言不極，不斷其威，不習其謀。」孔穎達疏：「斷，絕也。」

　　「斷」還可表示斬、殺。《漢書‧淮南厲王劉長傳》：「幸臣有罪，大者立斷，小者肉刑，不仁。」顏師古注：「斷謂斬也。」

　　「斷」亦表示區分。《逸周書‧度訓》：「明王是以極等以斷好惡，教民次分。」

　　「斷」也可以表示判斷。《易‧繫辭上》：「繫辭焉以斷其吉凶，是故謂之爻。」

　　「斷」可指果斷。《史記‧李斯列傳》：「斷而敢行，鬼神避之。」

　　「斷」還能用作副詞，表示決然、一定等語義。《易‧繫辭下》：「介如石焉，寧用終日，斷可識。」

①長形的東西從中間分開：斷裂。斷層。斷面。截斷。斷腸。斷魂。斷線風箏。
②不繼續，禁絕：斷糧。斷水。斷炊。斷奶。斷檔。斷流。斷種(zhǒng)。斷交。斷片。斷續。斷子絕孫。
③判定，決定：判斷。診斷。斷獄(審理和判決罪案)。
④一定，絕對：斷乎不可。斷然施行。
(Simplified: 断)

從「 𢇍 」，從「 斤 」，本義為截斷。《說文》：「𣃔，截也。从斤从𢇍。𢇍，古文絕。𠸿，古文斷从𠧢。𠧢，古文叀字。《周書》曰：『𠸿𠸿猗無他技。』𠜷，亦古文。」參見「 絕 」。《詩‧豳風‧七月》：「七月食瓜，八月斷壺。」 「 斷 」可表示特指人的肢體斷折。《禮記‧王制》：「瘖聾跛躄斷者、侏儒，百工各以其器食之。」鄭玄注：「斷，謂支節絕也。」 「 斷 」還表示斷絕、隔絕。《禮記‧儒行》：「過言不再，流言不極，不斷其威，不習其謀。」孔穎達疏：「斷，絕也。」 「 斷 」還可表示斬、殺。《漢書‧淮南厲王劉長傳》：「幸臣有罪，大者立斷，小者肉刑，不仁。」顏師古注：「斷謂斬也。」 「 斷 」亦表示區分。《逸周書‧度訓》：「明王是以極等以斷好惡，教民次分。」 「 斷 」也可以表示判斷。《易‧繫辭上》：「繫辭焉以斷其吉凶，是故謂之爻。」 「 斷 」可指果斷。《史記‧李斯列傳》：「斷而敢行，鬼神避之。」 「 斷 」還能用作副詞，表示決然、一定等語義。《易‧繫辭下》：「介如石焉，寧用終日，斷可識。」

斷字的基本解释

斷
duàn
见“断”。

斷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duàn］
［《廣韻》都管切，上緩，端。］
［《廣韻》徒管切，上緩，定。］
［《廣韻》丁貫切，去换，端。］
“断1”的繁体字。亦作“断1”。
(1)截断；折断。
(2)特指人的肢体断折。
(3)拦截；拦劫。参见“斷道”。
(4)断绝；隔绝。
(5)杀；斩。
(6)戒除；禁绝。
(7)分。区分；分离；划分。
(8)起。指时间的上限。
(9)限。时限；限度。
(10)了却；了结。
(11)指断送、葬送。
(12)判断；决断；决定。
(13)判罪；判决。
(14)治。
(15)果断。
(16)商订。
(17)整批地交易大宗货物。
(18)专一；专诚。参见“斷斷休休”。
(19)片段之木。
(20)泛指其他片段之物。参见“斷雲”。
(21)孤单。参见“斷雁”、“斷煙”、“斷篷”。
(22)残余。参见“斷墨殘楮”。
(23)陡峭。参见“斷崖”、“斷壁”。亦指陡峭的岩谷。
(24)指古琴断纹。
(25)副词。决然；一定

斷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斤字部】　斷； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页480第35
〔古文〕???【唐韻】【正韻】都管切【集韻】【韻會】覩緩切，?音短。【說文】作?。截也。【書·盤庚】乃斷棄汝。【傳】斷，絕也。【詩·商頌】是斷是遷。【疏】於是斬斷之。　又【廣韻】【正韻】徒管切【集韻】【韻會】杜管切，?音?。絕也。【羣經音義】旣絕曰斷。【釋名】斷，段也。分爲異段也。【易·繫辭】其利斷金。【疏】其纖利能斷截於金。　又【集韻】徒玩切【正韻】杜玩切，?音段。義同。又【廣韻】丁貫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】都玩切，?音鍛。決也。【易·繫辭】以斷天下之疑。【疏】決斷天下之疑。　又【書·秦誓】斷斷猗無他技。【疏】斷斷，守善之貌。　又【周禮·地官·司徒】凡萬民之不服敎，而有獄訟者，與有地治者，取而斷之。　又【韻補】叶多卷切。【白居易·寄元九詩】一病經四年，親友書信斷。彼獨是何人，心如石不轉。　又叶徒眷切。【鮑照·擬古】居人掩閨臥，行子中夜飯。野風吹秋木，行子心腸斷。

斷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
斷字的起名意思

暂无。

Cut off
Basic explanation of words
Cut off
duàn
See "break".
Cut off
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duàn］
["Guang Yun" is all in control, slow in the top, and in the end. ]
["Guangyun" only manages to cut, the upward slow, the fixed. ]
["Guangyun" Ding Guanqi, change, end. ]
Traditional characters of "断1". Also called "Break 1".
(1) Truncated; broken off.
(2) Especially refers to the broken or broken body of a person.
(3) Interception; interception. See "Broken Road".
(4) Severe; isolate.
(5) Kill; cut.
(6) Abstain; forbid.
(7) Points. Distinguish; separate; divide.
(8) Since. Refers to the upper limit of time.
(9) Limit. Time limit; limit.
(10) Ended; closed.
(11) Refers to ruling or funeral.
(12) Judgment; decision; decision.
(13) Conviction; judgment.
(14) Governance.
(15) Decisive.
(16) Negotiate.
(17) Bulk goods are traded in bulk.
(18) Dedicated; dedicated. See "break and rest".
(19) Fragment of Wood.
(20) Generally refers to other fragments. See "Broken Cloud".
(21) Lonely. See "Broken Goose", "Broken Smoke", "Broken Canopy".
(22) Residual. See "Remains of Ink Broken".
(23) Steep. See "Break Cliff", "Broken Wall". Also refers to the steep rock valley.
(24) Refers to the broken lines of the guqin.
(25) Adverbs. Definitely
Cut off
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Jin Zi Department] 　off; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 480 to 35
[Ancient text]??? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] All control [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Slow cut, short sound. [Said the text] For?. Cut also. 【Shu·Pangeng】It's abandoning you. 【Biography】Severe, absolutely. 【Poetry·Commercial Song】It's broken or changed. [Sparse] So cut it off.　[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Tu Guan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Du Guan Qi, "Yin". Absolutely. [Sound and Meaning of the Scriptures] Di Jue said, Jue. [Release name] Duan, Duan Ye. Divided into different segments. 【Yi·Ci】It is profitable to cut gold. 【Sparse】Its slenderness can be cut off from gold.　[Jiyun] playing only and cutting [zhengyun] Du playing and cutting,? Segment. The same meaning. Also [Guang Yun] Ding Guanqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] all play cutting, sound forging. Definitely. 【Yi·Xi Ci】To break the suspicion of the world. [Sparse] Determine the doubts of the world.　[Book·Qin Oath] There is no other skill to break the law. 【Sparse】Cut off, keep a good appearance.　[Zhou Li·Diguan·Situ】Whoever refuses to accept all the people, and those who have prison litigation, and those who have the rule of the land, take them and terminate them.　[Rhyme Filling] The leaves are rolled and cut. [Bai Juyi · Jiyuan Nine Poems] After four years of illness, letters from relatives and friends were broken. Who is He Du, whose heart is like a rock.　 Ye Tujuan cut again. [Bao Zhao·Nigu] I live in hiding, and have dinner in the middle of my business. The wild wind blows the autumn woods, and the line is heartbroken.
